sentences.en: a man of great sartorial elegance
But anyone with similar designs on Brother Sharp's sartorial tips is out of luck.
sentences.cn: 但是如同犀利哥般穿着的,或许都是不幸之人.

sentences.en: James gave him some sartorial advice.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯给了他一些穿着方面的建议。

sentences.en: Jeans a powerful egalitarian message, but are far more likely to a sartorial deathtrap for politicians.
sentences.cn: 政客们穿上牛仔裤是传递亲民的讯息, 但也更容易犯穿衣禁忌.

sentences.en: John has been known for his sartorial elegance.
sentences.cn: 约翰因为衣着讲究而出名。

sentences.en: Proposed the method of design software oriented to intelligence industry sartorial equipment with embedded soft component.
sentences.cn: 提出了以嵌入式软构件思想设计面向智能缝制设备系列化需求的应用控制软件的方法.

sentences.en: The sartorial rules are strict: leotards must not stray into, god forbid, tutu territory.
sentences.cn: 对服装的要求很严格: 紧身连衣裤绝对不能, 但愿不会, 混入芭蕾短裙的队伍.

trans.tran_en: Sartorial means relating to clothes and to the way they are made or worn
